name: Ourmaze
description:
Ourmaze is a challenging horror adventure game. The player starts the game not knowing about himself or his past. As the game progresses, he starts figuring out who he really is, while exploring unknown environment, avoiding traps, solving puzzles and defeating his enemies to achieve the ultimate victory in this divine adventure of ancient rivalry.

Every decision has its consequences and there are several paths to death in the maze, but only one way to win, provided staying alive is a victory? Or you can claim back your throne the legit way ?

Controls

Move - WASD
Rotate view - Mouse
Look aside - Q/W
Flashlight ON/OFF - F
Read papers - CTRL+ENTER
Take items - ENTER
Duck down - CTRL
Jump - SPACE
Run - W+SHIFT
Brightness modes - B1, B2, B3, B4, B5
Mouse sensitivity - ALT+M/ALT+N

Features

  • Unique esoteric story
  • 25 story points
  • 67 uniquely designed corridors
  • Over 350 objects
  • 10 different types of enemies
  • 14 chest unlocking games
  • 10 open door games
  • 4 game path changing riddles

Recommended minimum

  • i5-2500k
  • 3GB free RAM available
  • nvidia GeForce GTX 650 Ti
  • 510MB of free hard disk space
  • Stereo sound
  • 64-bit Windows 7-10

Easy installation

  1. Unzip
  2. Run ourmaze.exe!

1.0.1 Patch

  • Introduces windowed mode
  • The switch box has camera focus now

1.0.2 Patch

  • Disables window resize for windowed mode
  • Smoother camera rotations
  • Cosmetic fix in chest unlocking games with hole
  • Stains position fixed
  • Intro animations guy changed to be more visible
  • Flashlight flickering introduced for some corridors

Cheats

  • Press C + 1 + 6 + Up to unlock chest games
  • Press C + 7 to pass the pentagram puzzle
